name: following_by_pk
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_pro.
Tool description: Insatgram API Pro Version
API description: Fetches the Instagram following list for a given user by their primary key (PK).

pk.description: The primary key of the Instagram user whose following list is to be fetched.

corsenabled.description: Enables Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS). Defaults to 'false'.

nextmaxid.description: The maximum ID for pagination to fetch subsequent pages of the following list. Defaults to None.
